page.title: 15SECRET M.O.D. ESTABLISHMENTS
page.content: Some of these establishments are so secret, they have been left off some maps. One in our 'D' block does research on deep sea diving and is so secret that we wern't allowd in! - but one of our pupil's father works there. They used to disect and do not very nice things to goats,but all that has now been stopped. These research establishments have created a lot of jobs for both the Navy and Civilians in the Gosport area. They have nearly all the up to date machinery and plenty of space to do all their work. If you work in one of these places you have to sign a special form called 'The Official Secrets Act'.
